items.title: Ben Rhodes Keeps Getting It Wildly Wrong on Israel and Gaza
items.description: Setting the record straight on the recent New York Times screed by Obama’s deputy national security adviser.

items.title: Pope Leo Reveals His Secret
items.description: What a 17th-century monk can still teach us.

items.title: Why State Courts Should Not Set National Energy Policy
items.description: Judges are improperly turning courts into bastions of climate activism.

items.title: Rein In the Presidential Pardon Power
items.description: A bipartisan pattern of executive abuse shows why the unilateral power to pardon should be reconsidered.

items.title: Report: Hegseth Gave Order to Kill Boat Operators Because They Were on a Target List
items.description: Is the Trump administration claiming the power to do what previous administrations have done: compile lists of ‘enemy combatants’ and kill them?
